mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID NOT IN (SELECT MEMBER_ID FROM TB_APPOINTMENT WHERE SCHEDULE = TO_TIMESTAMP(#{schedule}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI AM', 'NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE=ENGLISH')) AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(#{schedule}, 1, 10), 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'D') != DAY_OFF AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(#{schedule}, 12, 19), 'HH:MI AM', 'NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE=ENGLISH'), 'HH24:MI') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(START_TIME, 'HH24:MI') AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(END_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI AM', 'NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE=ENGLISH'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI AM', 'NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE=ENGLISH')-30/(24*60), 'HH24:MI')
